item.title: gpg public key
item.description:
I’ve recently created myself a GPG key to encrypt my emails.

Here is it. You can also download it from Keybase.

Send me some email. I’ll be happy to read from you!

item.title: Projet Wagon-Louffe
item.description:
Mes amis aiment bien faire des vidéos lorsqu’ils sont en vacances.

De mon côté j’aime bien mettre en avant leurs initiatives. Alors j’ai repensé la communication autour de leur projet en mettant une pointe d’imagination.

Le résultat est disponible ici.

Le site est auto-hébergé et dispose d’un certificat Let’s Encrypt pour toujours plus de sécurité.

item.title: mtwabp public keys
item.description:
Public SSH CA Certificate

The mtwabp.fr machines’ SSH host keys are signed with a certificates. It makes easier to prove the identity of the hosts you are connecting to. The SSH public certificate is:

ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAACAQC5E5 k1H4rmlVjO/TrgEyeWJuRTSmmCWfH92jhNNKmC02YXtm CL3hWExYYonWKwg27x+NLgygAejTCeuoIG23NfH/S0lv 8ozHayHJH+nFEHYonmPks40NtA3aMfFLbh35cuMBhz1d 1EhqJYh859dTkhTuyDctXtrAv6WruHIQ4WFYEeXY6PIh S9qd48Zu+pXvbTrK8608EE7Qb+P+ey9dRzrvfkLjyUF5 EpCtWzIsCuSL7gGjA5PTIiuNckjBZeu+Fp8e9gbT7QxD Vb9FTsACqk1B2o+IMmy8JIMEKARDALAnDFs/ZgOGfSSC o3G+GedlnyC8JzaW80jQfpDH6UZsYpIEpEL9LADlupzb u7YuTWU2a1eeYNtQdEQRID0WnRig3F6cubwtuMM5870t yvTS8lDq+MImhHCgYm/0KDamUxSEr/NJfBRwjhGdjZSE sHInCssY0VXYrYg3sENpcNhSl3jQbxauL2PELN0J9hsr YeiazvgRYS+1lpZmRHjUHgiDMbLygIQUwVLPS0+jP8Dj D8aKxgan5x1KcNJgqFAf/N8OvpYIk5WYImHbJlaHs337 FHdgg6C8pOvUxymlyx+rPL+eej6+O4KyBoxUntgOawiA Uy7WAiG8YDmy2M6BrcBbSXnznFgKT7d+MxhhYbH5a97K lB7rbkqtoVyt4oilmMiQ== CA key for mtwapb.fr

For this to work, you’ll have to add the SSH certificate to your ~/.ssh/known_hosts file. The new entry would should be something like his:

@cert-authority mtwabp.fr,*.mtwabp.fr ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAACAQC5E5k1 H4rmlVjO/TrgEyeWJuRTSmmCWfH92jhNNKmC02YXtmCL 3hWExYYonWKwg27x+NLgygAejTCeuoIG23NfH/S0lv8o zHayHJH+nFEHYonmPks40NtA3aMfFLbh35cuMBhz1d1E hqJYh859dTkhTuyDctXtrAv6WruHIQ4WFYEeXY6PIhS9 qd48Zu+pXvbTrK8608EE7Qb+P+ey9dRzrvfkLjyUF5Ep CtWzIsCuSL7gGjA5PTIiuNckjBZeu+Fp8e9gbT7QxDVb 9FTsACqk1B2o+IMmy8JIMEKARDALAnDFs/ZgOGfSSCo3 G+GedlnyC8JzaW80jQfpDH6UZsYpIEpEL9LADlupzbu7 YuTWU2a1eeYNtQdEQRID0WnRig3F6cubwtuMM5870tyv TS8lDq+MImhHCgYm/0KDamUxSEr/NJfBRwjhGdjZSEsH InCssY0VXYrYg3sENpcNhSl3jQbxauL2PELN0J9hsrYe iazvgRYS+1lpZmRHjUHgiDMbLygIQUwVLPS0+jP8DjD8 aKxgan5x1KcNJgqFAf/N8OvpYIk5WYImHbJlaHs337FH dgg6C8pOvUxymlyx+rPL+eej6+O4KyBoxUntgOawiAUy 7WAiG8YDmy2M6BrcBbSXnznFgKT7d+MxhhYbH5a97KlB 7rbkqtoVyt4oilmMiQ== CA key for mtwapb.fr

This certificate can also be put in your servers if you want me to be able to connect to them.

Public SSH krypto DNS

My current krypto public SSH key is available as follow and also as a DNS record at sshkey.kr.mtwabp.fr. More insigtht here

ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAINRGmf kvWf+wal/EpcLIex4GsdC9IFd8a3lilCMshQ2h anselmatus@protonmail.com

To access the public key, you can use the following:

dig TXT sshkey.kr.mtwabp.fr +short
